channel.title: Looking for some short vocal samples (hey’s and ho’s)
channel.description: I’m about done with one of the greatest projects I’ve done so far but I want to spice it up with some minor vocal samples like hey’s, ho’s, uh’s, yeah’s etc. Anyone have a custom drum kit filled with these I could use or have suggestions for how best to get some for myself from the internet? Any help would be much appreciated!

item.title: Looking for some short vocal samples (hey’s and ho’s)
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
Post links to free samples here! Production Talk
Post your .wav samples here so others can use them! Mod edit: Related topics: Importing Samples FAQ Thread about importing samples eg: from a PC Open sounds from other IOS apps in Auxy Sample Importing ideas Post your OWN ORIGINAL sample packs here

Maybe something in here??

Read full topic
item.source: Looking for some short vocal samples (hey’s and ho’s)
